neighbors.name: Richard L. Kelley, Ruth A. Kelley & Zachary J. Kelley
neighbors.claims: The Kelley family co-owns an agricultural parcel in rural Saline County and was part of an area where landowners petitioned against a proposed energy facility in 2025 [KWCH](https://www.kwch.com/2026/01/06/saline-county-commission-rejects-proposed-battery-storage-facility-after-resident-petition/). They have no recorded involvement in local elected bodies or committees, focusing on their farm and property concerns [KWCH](https://www.kwch.com/2026/01/06/saline-county-commission-rejects-proposed-battery-storage-facility-after-resident-petition/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Longtime farming family; no public office

approach_recommendations.engage: As a multigenerational farm family, they respond best to peers in agriculture. Engage via a respected local farmer or extension agent who can emphasize how the project might preserve farmland value and support the farm’s future for their son.
